questions.question: 3.To protect her delicate hands, Fran will not rake the yard, do the dishes, or __________.
My dog Noodle enjoys sniffing for edible garbage, __________, and lunging at squirrels.
Amanda's paycheck money goes to her savings account, cappuccino fund, and __________.
We searched the car trunk, ___, and the top of the refrigerator, but we couldn't find the food.
Bonkers, our dog, chews on furniture, ________, and snots up the car windows.

choices.answer: would drag us around the neighborhood during walks
he drags us around the neighborhood during walks
drags us around the neighborhood during walks

questions.question: John asked the teacher to be excused from class, get an extension on his paper, and _____.

choices.answer: spend the afternoon playing tennis with his friends
to spend the afternoon playing tennis with his friends
then to spend the afternoon playing tennis with his friends

questions.question: 11.Carlos not only missed his one-year anniversary with Adrianna __________.

choices.answer: but he also forgot his mother's birthday
but also forgot his mother's birthday
but also forgetting his mother's birthday

questions.question: When Ox the dog realized that the leash meant a bath, not a walk, he growled, pulled, and ____.

choices.answer: he was leaping like a fish

questions.question: All alone at home, Ox the dog had to decide either to shred a roll of toilet paper or _____.

choices.answer: chew another hole in the sofa arm
chewing another hole in the sofa arm
if he wanted to chew another hole in the sofa arm

questions.question: We looked for the car keys under the sofa cushions, _______, and on the counters and tabletops.

choices.answer: our search included the trash can
searching for them in the trash can

questions.question: Bathing Ox the dog requires arms to hold him in the tub, towels to mop up the water, and ___.

choices.answer: raincoats which will keep us dry
raincoats as protection against the oncoming deluge

questions.question: Unless you're a health nut, baked tofu, ____, and decaffeinated tea do not make a tasty meal!

choices.answer: vegetables steamed with no oil or seasoning

questions.question: Tonia kicked the back of Jalenâ€™s desk, _____, and poked his arm with her sharp pencil.
When Delores saw lima beans on her plate, she ______, claimed to feel sick, and left the table.
Before her run, Alicia __________, applied sunscreen, and increased the volume on her iPod.
